content:
FYI, GitHub added new options to "GHA workflow approval": https://github.blog/changelog/2021-07-01-github-actions-new-settings-for-maintainers/
There're two new options and the first option in the image will relax the restrictions and reduce reviewers' task
We may want to change that config on rust-lang/rust.
that very first option seems good to me, we haven't had problems with malicious PRs in the past and I think @Pietro Albini has set up various security things so the worst they can do is burn CPU time
